changelog:
1.8.1 Hotfix
- Cuba spawns now work properly in Haven Island slot
- Chongqing and Cuba assassins now have localised accents to blend in better 

1.8 - Splitting Cuba
NEW VERSION OF SDK IS OUT, GRAB IT FROM REQUIRED FILES ON FV DOWNLOADS PAGE
JSON UPDATE REQUIRED, GRAB FROM NEXUS FILES PAGE OR VARIANT PICKER WEBSITE 
- Adds Cuba variants to Ambrose Island by default, with option for Haven Island 
- Integrates The Splitter into The Rage (Daytime) variant
Many smaller changes, see Nexus changelog or Hitmanforum post for full list.
